awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Archie Rice, a pathetic music hall comic, plagued by debts, manipulates those around him in a defiant and selfish attempt to survive against improbable odds. He drinks, makes crude philosophical jokes about sex and politics and humiliates his lamenting, gin-soaked wife. Archie lures his father, Billy Rice, out of retirement for a benefit performance which will ultimately bring financial aid to Archie and his impractical investments.
plot: Archie Rice, an old-time British music hall performer sinking into final defeat, schemes to stay in show business.
title: The Entertainer
